titleStmt.title: Mr. Wither his prophesie of our present calamity, and (except we repent) future misery. Written by him in the yeare 1628.
Britain's remembrancer. Selections
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: In verse. An extract from "Britains Remembrancer". -- cf. BMC.
